data.comment: Today's referee, Andy Davies, has blown to start the match.
Goal! Steven Fletcher gives Stoke a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 28, Goal! Watford go level at 1-1 through Tom Cleverley in Watford.
The first-half has come to a close in Watford.
The second half has started at Vicarage Road.
In the minute 57, Nathaniel Chalobah (Watford) has received a yellow card from Andy Davies.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Watford.
Angus Gunn for Stoke has been booked by Andy Davies and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Watford take a 2-1 lead thanks to a Joao Pedro spot-kick..
In the minute 61, James Garner is on a sub for Tom Cleverley for Watford.
Watford make their second substitution with Andre Gray replacing Joao Pedro.
In the minute 66, Jacob Brown is replacing Steven Fletcher for Stoke at Vicarage Road.
Sam Vokes is replacing Tommy Smith for the away team.
Stoke's John Mikel Obi has been booked in Watford.
In the minute 81, Nick Powell grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Vicarage Road.
The away team replace Nick Powell with Jordan Cousins.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's third substitution at Vicarage Road with Will Hughes replacing Nathaniel Chalobah.
Ismaila Sarr puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
